recommendations: Srinath B "It's always a pleasure to be with Mr. Sumit. He is an excellent leader and mentor with a wealth of expertise. He is creative, organized, and kind, and he is constantly open to new ideas and recommendations. He has helped me develop in many aspects of my career and has taught me how to lead others. For all these years, it was a pleasure to be managed by him."

Nimisha Bajaj “It has been a pleasure working under Sumit's leadership in Meero. He has built the sales team for APAC, almost from scratch and has always been very actively involved in every step to ensure we hit our targets. He has been my go-to person for any problem, as he never followed the hierarchy structure. Sumit is a mentor, I always asked for and I have seen him build a very efficient/ number-driven team in our organisation, often in unexpected and unconventional ways.”

honors_and_awards.title: Speaker at Seamless Asia Singapore 2018
honors_and_awards.description: SEAMLESS ASIA 2018 - DAY TWO @ 14:25 THE EFFECT OF CASH ON DELIVERY ON E-TAILERS Encouraging uptake with incentives for e-payments and loyalty schemes What would Asia without cash look like? What are the key factors limiting the transition? What can the government and private sector do to enable the change? The importance of planning for failed delivery

honors_and_awards.description: The Panel included E-commerce growth in Frontier Markets of Myanmar & Cambodia

honors_and_awards.title: National Champion – HBR Case Study

honors_and_awards.title: Winner of Godrej "Brighter Business Challenge-2010"
honors_and_awards.description: Received PPO(Pre Placement Offer) from Godrej Properties for showcasing excellent knowledge about the Real Estate Industry. The competition was open to only the Top-8 B-schools of India receiving more than 150 entries for the First round.

honors_and_awards.description: Received "On the Spot" award and "Star Infoscion" Award for showcasing high commitment and quality in work.

honors_and_awards.title: Social Conscious Employee Award
honors_and_awards.description: Received the Social Conscious Employee award for contribution to the CSR activities of the company and showcasing leadership qualities in delivering with excellence.
